column4: I am trying to install ati drivers and I get this error: X Server: unable to detect
They aren't installed yet, that's the problem. I try to install and I get this error: X Server: unable to detect
did you get the drivers from the repos or from a website?
the ati website. I did the X reconfigure. Should I just hit enter a whole bunch of times or do I really need to enter anything?
make sure to enter the correct info in
how long have you been in ubuntu
I have had it on my comp for about 1 1/2 years, but I have only really used it for about 3 days
what version of ubuntu do you have
Hardy, and I know I should proly be on Ubuntu+1, but I figured it was a pretty generic question
